name: Azimut Electronics
overview:
Azimut is a corporate group, with over 30 years of experience, dedicated to the distribution of the most prestigious brand-name electronic products on the market to professionals in all of our operating sectors: navigation, automotive, outdoor and renewable energy.

Azimut Electronics operates mainly within its domestic territory, while it is also the exclusive distributor of certain brands in Southern Europe. We understand that distribution does not mean simply providing the highest quality brands, products and solutions to all our operating sectors; but that this must be complemented by a pre-sale and post-sale service with extensive technical knowledge of the product and a clear focus on customer service, and a logistics service that allows our products to reach our entire distribution network quickly and efficiently.

All the guarantees included in the ISO9001:2008 quality certificate. Our business model allows us to be present in over 2,000 establishments, offering the final customer a wide range of market-leading products from the brands Azimut Marine, Azimut On Road, Azimut Outdoor and Azimut Energy.

relationships.title: Marketing Manager for the Marine Division (Azimut Marine)
